fields.headline: India tour details
fields.bodyText: SQUAD *Nasser Hussain (Essex) Usman Afzaal (Notts) Martyn Ball (Gloucs) Mark Butcher (Surrey) Marcus Trescothick (Somerset) Graham Thorpe (Surrey) Michael Vaughan (Yorkshire) Mark Ramprakash (Surrey) Richard Dawson (Yorkshire) James Foster (Essex) Ashley Giles (Warks) Warren Hegg (Lancashire) Richard Johnson (Somerset) Matthew Hoggard (Yorkshire) Jimmy Ormond (Leics) Craig White (Yorkshire) ITINERARY Tomorrow Arrive in India November Nov 15-17 Practice in Bombay 18-19 MCA President's XI, Bombay 22-24 Board President's XI, Hyderabad 27-29 India A, Jaipur December Dec 3-7 1st Test, Mohali 11-15 2nd Test, Ahmedabad 19-23 3rd Test, Bangalore (return to England for Christmas) January Jan 22 1st one-day international, Madras (day/night) 25 2nd ODI, Calcutta (d/n) 28 3rd ODI, Kanpur 31 4th ODI, New Delhi February Feb 3 5th ODI, Bombay (d/n)
